title: Kozystayâ€™s guest profile comprises business travelers, staycation, and long-term guests, with 70% being foreigners.
firstText: Once on the Kozystay website, travelers can search for accommodations based on location, check-in and check-out dates, and the number of guests.
secondText: After exploring property details, they can proceed with booking. A personal account is created using their email. After a booking is completed, they receive a confirmation email.
